sources.title: Exposure
sources.description: Title: Exposure Summary: A reporter runs into a pretty young girl who has inherited her father's failing business. She wants to give it up, but he tries to convince her to make a go of it, mainly because he's in love with her. Directed by: Norman Houston Actors: Lila Lee, Walter Byron, Tully Marshall Production Company: Tower Productions (III) Release Date: 20 August 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A reporter runs into a pretty young girl who has inherited her father's failing business. She wants to give it up, but he tries to convince her to make a go of it, mainly because he's in love with her.
